name: Preethi Reddy
title: Sr SDET QA Engineer
professional_summary: Possess 8 years of experience in test automation and quality assurance across Healthcare, Government, Banking, and Consulting domains, with deep knowledge of Selenium and Appium frameworks for functional and regression testing.

Architected CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Docker to automate test execution, reducing deployment time and ensuring continuous quality checks throughout the software development lifecycle in banking and fintech applications.

Executed Black Box Testing and White Box Testing methodologies to validate application functionality, identify edge cases, and ensure compliance with banking regulations and security standards across multiple projects.

Utilized SQL for database validation, data integrity checks, and backend testing to verify transactional accuracy in fintech systems, ensuring data consistency across relational databases during regression cycles.

Configured test automation frameworks using Selenium WebDriver, TestNG, and Maven to standardize testing practices, improve code reusability, and accelerate test development across cross-functional teams.

Applied Agile methodology principles by participating in sprint planning, daily standups, and retrospectives to align testing efforts with development milestones and deliver quality software increments on schedule.

Debugged complex application defects by analyzing logs, reproducing issues in test environments, and collaborating with developers to identify root causes, resulting in faster resolution times and improved application stability.
Integrated Appium for mobile application testing on iOS and Android platforms, validating user workflows and ensuring seamless functionality for banking mobile apps used by millions of customers.

Automated API testing using REST Assured and Postman to verify service endpoints, validate response codes, and ensure data exchange accuracy between microservices in distributed fintech architectures.

Deployed test scripts in Kubernetes clusters to support scalable test execution across multiple environments, enabling parallel testing and reducing overall test cycle duration for large-scale banking applications.

Managed version control using Git and GitHub, maintaining test repositories, reviewing pull requests, and collaborating with team members to ensure code quality and consistency across automation suites.
Tracked defects and testing progress in JIRA, prioritizing critical issues, documenting test cases, and coordinating with product owners to ensure timely delivery of high-quality software releases.

Developed Python and Java scripts to automate repetitive testing tasks, generate test data, and enhance test coverage for complex banking workflows involving payment processing and account management.
Validated cloud-based testing environments on AWS to simulate production scenarios, perform load testing, and ensure application performance under varying traffic conditions for fintech services.

responsibilities: Analyzed HIPAA compliance requirements for healthcare applications and designed Selenium test automation frameworks to validate patient data security, encryption standards, and access controls across web-based clinical systems.

Built CI/CD pipelines in Jenkins to automate test execution for healthcare portals, integrating Docker containers to ensure consistent test environments and reduce manual deployment efforts during regression cycles.

Validated SQL database queries to verify patient record accuracy, claims processing logic, and billing calculations, ensuring data integrity across relational databases used in healthcare management systems.

Automated API testing using REST Assured to verify service integrations between healthcare providers, insurance claims systems, and third-party vendors, ensuring seamless data exchange and compliance with regulatory standards.

Configured Appium for mobile testing of healthcare applications on iOS and Android devices, validating patient appointment scheduling, medication reminders, and telehealth features to ensure functional accuracy.

Debugged critical production defects by analyzing application logs, reproducing issues in test environments, and coordinating with development teams to resolve medication dosage errors and claims processing failures.

Performed Black Box Testing on healthcare portals to identify usability issues, validate user workflows, and ensure compliance with FDA and HIPAA regulations during feature releases and system updates.

Implemented test data management strategies using Python scripts to generate synthetic patient records, ensuring compliance with privacy regulations while maintaining comprehensive test coverage for healthcare scenarios.

Collaborated with product owners and business analysts in Agile sprints to refine acceptance criteria, prioritize testing efforts, and deliver quality software increments aligned with healthcare business objectives.
Deployed automated test suites in Kubernetes clusters on AWS to support parallel test execution, reducing overall test cycle duration and enabling faster feedback for healthcare application releases.

Maintained test automation repositories in Git, reviewing pull requests and ensuring code quality standards across the QA team to promote consistency and reusability in healthcare test automation efforts.

Tracked defects and testing progress in JIRA, prioritizing critical issues related to patient safety, coordinating with stakeholders, and ensuring timely resolution of bugs before production deployments.
Conducted White Box Testing on backend services to validate business logic, examine code paths, and ensure proper error handling in healthcare claim adjudication and eligibility verification modules.

Reviewed test results from continuous testing pipelines, identified flaky tests, and optimized Selenium scripts to improve test stability and reliability for healthcare applications serving millions of patients.

Designed Selenium automation frameworks for government web portals, validating citizen service applications, license renewals, and public records access while ensuring compliance with state regulations and accessibility standards.

Established CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Docker to automate regression testing for government systems, reducing manual testing efforts and accelerating deployment cycles for critical public-facing applications.

Verified SQL database operations to validate taxpayer records, vehicle registration data, and benefits enrollment information, ensuring data accuracy and integrity across government databases during system migrations.

Assessed API integrations using REST Assured to test data exchanges between state agencies, federal systems, and third-party vendors, ensuring secure and accurate information sharing for public services.

Conducted Black Box Testing on unemployment benefits portals, identifying functional defects, validating eligibility calculations, and ensuring user-friendly interfaces for citizens accessing government assistance programs.

Resolved defects in government applications by debugging application logs, reproducing issues in staging environments, and working with developers to fix authentication failures and form submission errors.

Automated mobile testing using Appium for state mobile applications, validating features like license renewals, permit applications, and service requests on iOS and Android platforms used by Washington residents.
Managed test case documentation in JIRA, tracking defects, coordinating with stakeholders, and ensuring timely resolution of issues impacting public access to government services and online portals.

Participated in Agile ceremonies including sprint planning and retrospectives, aligning testing activities with development priorities and ensuring quality gates were met before releasing government software updates.

Scripted Python automation to generate test data for government systems, simulate citizen interactions, and validate complex workflows involving multi-step application processes and document verification.

Developed Selenium test automation scripts for online banking applications, validating account transactions, fund transfers, and bill payment features while ensuring compliance with banking security standards and regulations.

Integrated CI/CD pipelines in Jenkins to automate nightly regression testing for banking systems, using Docker containers to maintain consistent test environments and reduce infrastructure setup time.

Executed SQL queries to validate transaction records, account balances, and interest calculations in banking databases, ensuring financial accuracy and data consistency during system upgrades and releases.

Performed API testing using REST Assured to verify payment gateway integrations, validate transaction responses, and ensure secure communication between banking services and external financial networks.

Applied Black Box Testing techniques to identify functional issues in customer-facing banking portals, validating login workflows, account management features, and regulatory compliance with financial industry standards.
Investigated defects in banking applications by debugging logs, analyzing stack traces, and coordinating with development teams to resolve payment processing failures and authentication issues.

Coordinated with business analysts and product managers in Agile sprints to understand banking requirements, refine test scenarios, and deliver quality software releases aligned with customer expectations.
Organized test automation code in Git repositories, followed branching strategies, and participated in code reviews to maintain high-quality test scripts and promote collaboration across the QA team.

Created Selenium test scripts for client web applications, validating user registration, login functionality, and data entry forms to ensure application reliability and meet client acceptance criteria.

Ran SQL queries to verify data consistency in application databases, checked record integrity, and validated backend operations during testing cycles for consulting projects across multiple client engagements.

Tested web application features using Black Box Testing methods, identified functional defects, documented issues in JIRA, and worked with developers to ensure timely bug fixes before client releases.

Supported API testing efforts using Postman to validate service endpoints, check response codes, and verify data payloads for client applications integrating with third-party systems and external APIs.
Attended Agile meetings, contributed to sprint planning discussions, and aligned testing activities with development schedules to deliver quality software increments for consulting clients on time.

Maintained test documentation, recorded test execution results, and reported testing progress to project managers and stakeholders, ensuring transparency and accountability in consulting project deliverables.

certifications: ISTQB Advanced Level Agile Technical Tester (CTAL-ATT)
